text: وَلَقَدۡ هَمَّتۡ بِهِۦۖ وَهَمَّ بِهَا لَوۡلَآ أَن رَّءَا بُرۡهَٰنَ رَبِّهِۦۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءَۚ إِنَّهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا ٱلۡمُخۡلَصِينَ

translation.en: And she certainly determined [to seduce] him, and he would have inclined to her had he not seen the proof of his Lord. And thus [it was] that We should avert from him evil and immorality. Indeed, he was of Our chosen servants
translation.id: Dan Sungguh, perempuan itu telah berhasrat kepadanya (Yusuf). Dan Yusuf pun berkehendak kepadanya, sekiranya dia tidak melihat tanda (dari) Tuhannya.411) Demikianlah, Kami palingkan darinya keburukan dan kekejian. Sungguh, dia (Yusuf) termasuk hamba Kami yang terpilih
